PLACEHOLDERS.NAME: contactID
PLACEHOLDERS.DESCRIPTION: The resource contact ID to interact with

PARAMETERS.NAME: message
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Message to be saved for the contact.

PARAMETERS.NAME: showAlert
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Whether a modal alert should be shown when viewing the contact's profile.

DESCRIPTION: Interacts with a specfic contact. You can read (GET) or update (PUT) a contact's message. The parameters below refer only to PUT requests.
